And retribution there was.

Meteara: This was a personnal offense. You will be treated 
accordingly, but I will spare your life since this matter concerns not 
my masters.

The pincer on her left arm closed and shot one massive discharge of 
electricity.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        "Yeah yeah yeah, you and Hitler.  Go cleanse yourself while 
you're at 
> it."  He holds his nose.  "Frankly you could use it."  He laughs and 
turns 
> away.  With his back turned he makes one last insulting gesture. He 
crosses 
> his arms and waits for the retribution.
